name: mapOrFail
signature: { <A, B>(f: (a: A) => Either<B, ConfigError>): (self: Config<A>) => Config<B>; <A, B>(self: Config<A>, f: (a: A) => Either<B, ConfigError>): Config<B>; }
description:
Returns a new config whose structure is the samea as this one, but which
may produce a different value, constructed using the specified fallible
function.
